price: Ṣíọ̀ ẹ̀yin àti n̄ǹkan tí ẹ̀ ń jọ́sìn fún lẹ́yìn Allāhu, ṣé ẹ̀yin kò níí ṣe làákàyè ni?"
arabic: أُفّٖ لَّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: uffin lakum walimā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi afalā taʿqilūna
